Package BusinessLogicLayer

Class OrderItemBLL

java.lang.Object
BusinessLogicLayer.OrderItemBLL
public class OrderItemBLL extends Object
The OrderItemBLL class represents the business logic layer for managing OrderItem entities.

This class handles validation logic and delegates database operations to the OrderItemDAO. It enforces rules such as requiring a positive quantity and a non-negative price.
